sentence.Network_en: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
sentence.Network_cn: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

sentence.Network_en: Acupressure is manual pressure applied to a specific slightly depressed point on the body.
sentence.Network_cn: 指压按摩是用手按压人体某个轻微凹陷的穴位。

sentence.Network_en: It is better to treat your condition with acupressure therapy.
sentence.Network_cn: 用按摩疗法治您的病效果较好.

entry.def: Acupressure is the treatment of pain by a type of massage in which pressure is put on certain areas of a person's body.

example.ex: Acupressure is used to release tension spots in the shoulders and neck.
example.tran: 指压按摩用于缓解肩部和颈部的紧张。

means.word_mean: 1. treatment of symptoms by applying pressure with the fingers to specific pressure points on the body
